issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.body:

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

review.body: `##.top-genre-articles-item:has(> div[id^="div-gpt-"])` is enough in this case. Of note `##.top-genre-articles-item:not([href])` can be used too, but the former is safer.

issue.body:

comment.body:
@shinogithub202238 I have fixed the issue, but it will take some time for the MV3 extension to get the update. Meanwhile, you can add
```
||adx.promo^$badfilter
```

to your User rules.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 7 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://e.mail.ru/inbox/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.mail.ru%2Finbox%2F) ### Comment > Постоянные всплывающие, постоянно двигающие окна, безобразной > > мешающей вообще смотреть рекламы. issue.title: rutube.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://rutube.ru/video/1c40d4ae38889601c8587ba68784bf07/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frutube.ru%2Fvideo%2F1c40d4ae38889601c8587ba68784bf07%2F) ### Comment > Я уже не раз делал эту заявку. И на почту вам отсылал по вашему требованию код страницы и скриншоты. Но ничего не меняется вообще! И ответа мне не приходит. Да я никогда не поверю, что такую простую проблему вы не можете решить. Значит - договорённость с рутюбом? Ну так и скажите, чтобы я не составлял всякий раз заявки. Или неудобно получается, что договариваетесь с кем-то? Какой тогда смысл в вашей банерорезалке? Проще другие бесплатные поставить расширением в браузер - их много. Я платил за то, чтобы гарантировано избавиться от всего этого. А вы делаете вид, что не можете придушить какое-то вшивенькое всплывающее окно. Так сделаете или нет? Просто ответьте - уберёте это окно или нет? Чтобы я своё время больше с вами не тратил. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/l603jlmtvvkgc8s0ow080kcs4c44w8ghcdh88dt32g.png?nc=1)

Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`

`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)`

issue.title: gemini.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gemini.google.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgemini.google.com%2F) ### Comment > アプリGeminiおよびGoogleかこって検索。 > 使う度に接続エラー発生。 > AdoGuard(広告ブロックアプリ)の設定では、Gemini及びGoogleアプリのみAdoGuard経由だけをオンにしています。 > その他はOFFにしてます。 > なお、端末上でのバッテリー制限も制限無しを設定。 > それでも解決されず。 > 流石に情報漏洩対策としてAdoGuard経由で利用したいと考えております。 > また、別件ですが、アプリAmazonおよびアプリAmazonビジネスでも、必要最低限、AdoGuard経由だけをオンにしても一度で立ち上がらず画面が真っ白になる。 > アプリを再起動すると立ち上がる。 > > 愛称の問題でしょうか? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/ca20q7p7x5w040ss4s4cc0cc008k0g0lki9eedcfc0.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: gemini.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gemini.google.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgemini.google.com%2F) ### Comment > アプリGeminiおよびGoogleかこって検索。 > 使う度に接続エラー発生。 > AdoGuard(広告ブロックアプリ)の設定では、Gemini及びGoogleアプリのみAdoGuard経由だけをオンにしています。 > その他はOFFにしてます。 > なお、端末上でのバッテリー制限も制限無しを設定。 > それでも解決されず。 > 流石に情報漏洩対策としてAdoGuard経由で利用したいと考えております。 > また、別件ですが、アプリAmazonおよびアプリAmazonビジネスでも、必要最低限、AdoGuard経由だけをオンにしても一度で立ち上がらず画面が真っ白になる。 > アプリを再起動すると立ち上がる。 > > 愛称の問題でしょうか? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/ca20q7p7x5w040ss4s4cc0cc008k0g0lki9eedcfc0.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/gqj54xym98o44c0csk0css88ckgcc0cngfnt6l0u00.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: [False Negative]: add phishing domain (elecfrunn[.]digital)
issue.body:
> [!IMPORTANT]
> ## Executive Summary
> 
> This report documents 1 domain(s) that have been identified as part of active phishing operations. These domains exhibit characteristics consistent with malicious infrastructure and pose an immediate security risk to internet users.

The following 1 domain(s) have been analyzed and confirmed as participating in phishing campaign(s):

```
elecfrunn.digital
```

## Threat Analysis

### Phishing Attack Details
  
These domains are part of a phishing campaign targeting cryptocurrency companies and cryptocurrency holders/investors.
Attackers may use fake login pages, fake Web3 wallet connection prompts, fake cryptocurrency exchange/swap interfaces, or modified/malicious software to steal cryptocurrency seed phrases/keys.

### Technical Details

- Cloaked. This means: if a request does not meet certain internal rules of the attacker, the request may be redirected to a non-existent subdomain "www.www.", a legitimate website, or display various HTTP errors such as 403, 404, 502, etc., SSL certificate errors, infinite loading, or a fake Cloudflare (or other service) CAPTCHA, or show content distinguishable from the phishing page.

### Detections & Targeted Brands
- `elecfrunn.digital` targets Electrum (electrum.org)
  - VirusTotal: **0 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/elecfrunn.digital/detection
  - Listed on Spamhaus - https://check.spamhaus.org/results/?query=elecfrunn.digital
  - Listed on APVA - https://api.antiphish.org/v1/lookup?host=elecfrunn.digital




## Screenshots

(Screenshots for some scans may not display or may not contain complete or correct content for various reasons, which can be seen on the specific scan page)

<details>
<summary>Screenshots</summary>

![Screenshot](https://urlscan.io/screenshots/019af9d2-7bc3-716e-be06-9781b120dc11.png)

</details>

### Prerequisites

- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

*

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: www.billboard.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: [False Negative]: add 47 phishing domains (exodus[.]walletv3[.]com, webexodus[.]created[.]app, ...)
issue.body:
> [!IMPORTANT] > ## Executive Summary > > This report documents 47 domain(s) that have been identified as part of active phishing operations. These domains exhibit characteristics consistent with malicious infrastructure and pose an immediate security risk to internet users. The following 47 domain(s) have been analyzed and confirmed as participating in phishing campaign(s): ``` exodus.walletv3.com webexodus.created.app guidance.ghost.io started-trzor.framer.ai yupoo-megamillions.ru yupoo-powerball.ru trezorsuite.wasmer.app trazore-suites.framer.ai trezzrsuite.framer.ai usecorns.live curve-flnance.com curve.sbs suite-trezor.click washingtonpost-news.com lido-elhereum.net v3-yearn.org alltayer.finance zer.potrfolio.cc zerion.potrfolio.com v2-solavre.com onchain-debank.com app-defituna.github.io detifuna.net yupoo-dhgate.ru yupoo-husky.ru perfume-yupoo.ru yupooz.com jersey-yupoo.com soccer-jersey-yupoo.com yupoo.site app.lido-dashboard.pro app.altlayer.ink yearn.fi-home.org app.zeiron.run app.solayer.bond www.yupooz.com www.jersey-yupoo.com ksj.d7jyu2dnjykvx.amplifyapp.com starttrezor.wordpress.com exodustrading-ai.com interbank.mobi yupoonetherlands.ru yupoofrance.ru yupoosunglasses.ru bestyupoo.com jerseyyupoo.com yupooclothes.com ``` ## Threat Analysis ### Phishing Attack Details These domains are part of a phishing campaign targeting cryptocurrency companies and cryptocurrency holders/investors. Attackers may use fake login pages, fake Web3 wallet connection prompts, fake cryptocurrency exchange/swap interfaces, or modified/malicious software to steal cryptocurrency seed phrases/keys. ### Technical Details - No sophisticated cloaking detected. ### Detections & Targeted Brands - `exodus.walletv3.com` targets Exodus (exodus.com) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/exodus.walletv3.com/detection - `webexodus.created.app` targets Exodus (exodus.com) - VirusTotal: **2 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/webexodus.created.app/detection - `guidance.ghost.io` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **1 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/guidance.ghost.io/detection - `started-trzor.framer.ai` targets Trezor Wallet (trezor.io) - VirusTotal: **0 detections** - https://www.virustotal.com/gui/domain/started-trzor.framer.ai/detection - ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.ecpsoftshop.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ecpsoftshop.com%2F) ### Comment > ### Missed Ads (Site-specific request) > > Please add ad-blocking rules specifically for this website only. > > **Target Website:** https://www.ecpsoftshop.com/windows > > **Issue:** > This website displays advertisements, but AdGuard does not block them. > I am requesting ad-blocking rules that apply **ONLY to this domain**, not globally. > > **Details:** > - Ads on this page (such as banners or promotional sections) are visible. > - These ads remain even when AdGuard is enabled. > > **Steps to reproduce:** > 1. Go to https://www.ecpsoftshop.com/windows > 2. The advertisements on the page appear normally. > 3. AdGuard does not block them. > > **Expected behavior:** > AdGuard should block the ad elements **for this specific website only**, without affecting other websites. > > **Please add site-specific filters for this domain.** > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/a4fx86sc9ygoos48wk4ccsscw084gs4aiossm0xdrs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/dyg7oljkp14w4gskg0so88scsk0c80f69kmgtq4ls8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.500.7 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Filters last update: | December 01, 2025 at 09:00 ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.500.7&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=2&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&filters_last_update=2025-12-01T09%3A00%3A45)

comment.body:
Unable to understand/recognize what it is wrong.
Please re-report your issue **with** a screenshot (including highlight) and more description.
Maybe another web browser extension or adware software causes your issue.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
